description: Despite its flaws, senior docs say the call system is an important learning ground for essential skills. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'My brain kind of stops functioning': Long working hours leaving young doctors exhausted
title_page: 'My brain kind of stops functioning': Long working hours leaving young doctors exhausted | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - After 20 hours at work, Kenneth starts losing his grip on reality.
It becomes harder for the young doctor to calculate medication doses and make decisions as his thoughts slow to a crawl.
